name: Solomon National Museum
description: Discover the rich cultural history of the Solomon Islands with artifacts, traditional canoes, and colonial records.

name: Bonegi Beach

description: Explore the caves and natural falls made famous during WWII battles.

name: Skull Island
description: Sacred island with ancestral skull shrines and traditional stories.
